DOC.brief_summary: Hirschsprungs Associated Enterocolitis (HAEC) with incidence up to 30% postoperatively. The objective of the trial is to prevent postoperative HAEC by using Probiotics.
DOC.brief_title: Probiotics for Prophylaxis of Postoperative Hirschsprungs Associated Enterocolitis
DOC.detailed_description: Randomised Controlled Study with two arms. All cases following up for post operative Hirschsprungs surgery are included in this study. First arm will receive a probiotics in the form of sachet for 6 months. Second arm will receive a multivitamin as placebo. Comparative analysis between the two groups for baseline and followup prevalence of Hirschsprungs associated enterocolitis.
DOC.criteria: Hirschsprungs disease confirmed preoperative and postoperative specimen pathology Other cases of Enterocolitis and constipation
